T02D1559:215b-1: kurma p'a da s'a dha nam /
T02D1559:215b-3: rus sbal zhabs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1559:215b-4: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1559:215b-5: re zhig dur khrod la sogs phyogs dben par //
T02D1559:215b-6: rnal 'byor pa yis rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i //
T02D1559:215b-7: rten dgram mchod dam gtor ma la sogs bshams //
T02D1559:215b-8: g-yeng ba'i rgyu spangs bde ba'i stan 'dug ste //
T02D1559:215b-9: sngon 'gro'i cha ga rdzogs byas phyi yi ni //
T02D1559:215b-10: snang ba yul la sems gtad de brtan nas //
T02D1559:215b-11: gnyis pa rang nyid chu skyes rig byed gter //
T02D1559:215b-12: ral ba chen dbus stobs chen pags pa mnan //
T02D1559:215b-13: ri rgyal bya mdog mig gi phyag dang ldan //
T02D1559:215b-14: gri gug ka p'a la ni ra dzos bkang /
T02D1559:216a-1: steng bzhugs thod pas mgo lus brgyan //
T02D1559:216a-2: sha rgyas zhal ni cung zad 'dzum pa yi //
T02D1559:216a-3: de 'dra'i lha la sems brtan gsum pa ni //
T02D1559:216a-4: sna rtser yungs 'bru tsam gyi lha la dmigs //
T02D1559:216a-5: de yang rim gyis snang med mkha' lta bu //
T02D1559:216a-6: gsal nas dngos grub rnal 'byor pa yis mthong //
T02D1559:216a-7: thun mtshams mchod dang gtor ma bzlas pa dang //
T02D1559:216a-8: bsngo ba bya ste ci bder gnas par bya //
T02D1559:216a-9: rngon pa'i gdams pa rdzogs so /
T02D1559:216a-11: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta aa nanda ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang /
